INSERT INTO t_stay_reservation ( sr_id, si_id, ri_id, mi_id, sr_name, sr_email, sr_phone, sr_request, sr_date, sr_adult, sr_child, sr_checkin, sr_checkout, sr_roomprice, sr_discount, sr_addperson_fee, sr_totalprice, sr_payment, sr_paydate, sr_status ) VALUES ( #{srId}, #{siId}, #{riId}, #{miId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srName}, #{srEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srPhone}, #{srRequest,jdbcType=CLOB}, SYSDATE, #{srAdult}, #{srChild}, #{srCheckin}, #{srCheckout}, #{srRoomprice}, #{srDiscount}, #{srAddpersonFee}, #{srTotalprice}, #{srPayment}, SYSDATE, #{srStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.ri_name, sr.sr_id, sid.si_address, sid.si_phone, sid.si_email, sp.sp_url, sr.sr_status, sr.sr_adult, sr.sr_child, sr.sr_checkin, sr.sr_checkout, sr.sr_request, sr.sr_totalprice, sr.sr_discount, sr.sr_payment, TO_CHAR(sr.sr_paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sr_paydate, TO_CHAR(sr.sr_cancledate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sr_cancledate FROM t_stay_reservation sr JOIN t_room_info r ON sr.ri_id = r.ri_id JOIN t_stay_info_detail sid ON sr.si_id = sid.si_id LEFT JOIN t_stay_photo sp ON sr.si_id = sp.si_id AND sp.sp_idx = 1 -- 대표 이미지만 WHERE sr.sr_id = #{srId} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT sr.sr_id AS srId, sr.mi_id AS miId, sr.sr_email AS srEmail, sr.sr_checkin AS srCheckin, sr.sr_status AS srStatus, si.si_name AS siName FROM t_stay_reservation sr JOIN t_stay_info si ON sr.si_id = si.si_id WHERE sr.sr_id = #{srId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
